Address: 2175 POINT BOULEVARD SUITE 375, ELGIN, Illinois, 60123, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Heritage-Crystal Clean, LLC (herein collectively referred to as "we," "us," "our," "HCC" or "the Company") is a wholly owned subsidiary of Heritage-Crystal Clean, Inc. (herein referred to as "HCCI"). HCC provides full-service parts cleaning, containerized waste management, used oil collection, vacuum truck services, antifreeze recycling, field services, and owns and operates a used oil re-refinery. We believe that we are the second largest provider of full-service parts cleaning, hazardous and non-hazardous waste services and used oil collection services to small and mid-sized customers in both the industrial and vehicle maintenance sectors in North America, and we are the second largest used oil re-refiner by capacity in North America. We operate our business through our Environmental Services and Oil Business segments.  ... More ...
